i love children.
my favorite artist is guns and roses.

I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I eat my feelings.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing. I like to dance ballet but I'm not sure if my parents would approve.
Oh that's cool. I don't think my parents would approve either. I'm more into hiking and spending time in the mountains.
That's cool too! I love to hike, but I'm not as good at it as you are. I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs once. It was awesome!
Wow, that's amazing! I love finding hidden things. I don't have any dogs, but I love hiking with my kids. I want to be a good role model for them.
That's great! I love my collie. I'm passionate about being a good dog parent too.
That's wonderful! I'm sure you're a great dog parent.
Thank you! I try my best.
What's your favorite thing to do with your collie?
I love to go for walks in the park with her. We also play fetch and go swimming in the summer.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun together!
We do! I'm so glad I have her
